original_text: Offer the second lamb at twilight, along with the same kind of grain offering and drink offering that you offer in the morning. This is a food offering, an aroma pleasing to the Lord.
korean_text: 해 질 때에는 두 번째 어린 양을 드리되 아침에 드린 소제와 전제와 같이 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Offer the second lamb at twilight
sentences.korean_translation: 해 질 때 두 번째 어린 양을 드리라

sentences.original_text: along with the same kind of grain offering
that you offer in the morning
an aroma pleasing to the Lord
